summary: Provides the core logic for constructing and analysing the Conan installation graph. It models recipes and packages as nodes, resolves dependencies, applies profile arguments and overrides, detects missing, invalid or cyclic references, and computes a deterministic build/download order suitable for CI pipelines.
business_intent: Enable reliable and automated resolution of C/C++ package dependencies during Conan install operations, ensuring correct build sequencing, handling configuration profiles, and reporting dependency issues.
